signature: void write(RTree<T, S>, OutputStream) throws IOException

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of FlatBufferBuilder for serialization.
Both methods involve converting geometric data into FlatBuffer format.

enhanced_by.method_name: addNode(Node<T, S>, FlatBufferBuilder, Func1<? super T, byte[]>)
enhanced_by.reason: The addNode method must be invoked to serialize the tree structure before writing to the OutputStream.
Reading from an InputStream is a prerequisite for writing to an OutputStream, ensuring data integrity.
